other_title: Dragon Ball Kai Majin Boo Hen (Japanese)
Dragon Ball Z Kai: Episódios Finais (Portuguese)
Dragon Ball Z Kai: The Final Chapters
ドラゴンボール改 魔人ブウ編 (Japanese)
plot: Since Cell's defeat Gohan has grown up and go to the university then she meets Videl which who has some adventures, then both and his new brother Goten are training for the new tournament, in which Goku came back from the dead for one day. In half of the tournament a misterious persons advice the group about the resurrection of the dangerous Majin boo, but all plans fails and every one try new ways to stop The dangerous Majin boo who gets stronger each time. Goku and his friends make everything for stopping them through fights.
opening_theme: "Fight it out!" (International Version) by Masatoshi Ono (eps 99-)
ending_theme: "Haikei, Zarathustra (拝啓、ツラツストラ; Dear Zarathustra)" by Good Morning America (eps 99-111)
"Don't Let Me Down" by Gacharic Spin (eps 147-159)
insert_song: "Let it Burn" (International Version) by Masatoshi Ono (ep 158)
